loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Adela Isamar

texts.es:
Desde pequeña, a Adela le gustaba jugar al salón de belleza, sus muñecas eran las que a diario recibían un cambio de look, hoy es la actividad en la que se quiere profesionalizar. Ella tiene 22 años de edad, está en unión libre y tiene un hijo. Está en el primer año de un curso de belleza, es una mujer trabajadora y una madre responsable, aparte de estudiar, presta servicios de belleza en su barrio para obtener ingresos y brindarle salud y educación de calidad a su hijo. En su ardua  jornada la apoyan su madre y su compañero de vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales del curso de belleza. Adela deposita su confianza en el financiamiento, puesto que su meta es ser la mejor en su clase, quiere aprender los suficiente y así ofrecer una variedad de servicios, tales como peinados llamativos, maquillaje profesional, pedicure, manicure, entre otros. A pesar de los contratiempos, Adela planea seguir luchando, asegura que su hijo es su fuente de motivación. Anhela graduarse y lograr abrir un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Since she was young, Adela liked to play "beauty school." Her dolls got daily makeovers. Now, she does this work professionally. Adela, 22, is in a civil union and has a son. She is in her first year of beauty school. She is a hard-working and responsible woman. Apart from school, she offers beauty services in her neighborhood to earn income and provide health and education to her son. During her busy day, her mother and life partner help her.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials for beauty school. Adela puts her trust in financing because her goal is to improve in her class. She wants to learn enough to offer a variety of services, such as attractive hairstyles, professional makeup, pedicures, manicures, and more. Despite difficulties, Adela keeps fighting, and she says that her son is her source of motivation. She hopes to graduate and open a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy materials for beauty school.

loans.name: Aureliana

texts.es:
Aureliana tiene 53  años, está casado con el señor Apolonio, tienen dos hijos, quienes están estudiando en la capital del país. 
Aureliana  comenta que empezó a surtir para su despensa actividad a la cual se dedica actualmente con la ayuda de su marido, cuenta con una despena bien surtida donde vende todo tipo de productos para de esa forma satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, y también hacerse de una mayor clientela cada día.
Aureliana es una señora muy  trabajadora y sacrificada, tuvo que sortear varios obstáculos para logar todo lo que actualmente posee.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de animales vacunos, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir creciendo y mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Aureliana is 53 years old, she is married to Apolonio, and they have two children who are studying in the country's capital.

Aureliana states that she began to supply for the store in which she works currently with the help of her husband. She has a well-stocked store where she sells all sorts of products, in order to satisfy the needs of her customers, and also to have a larger customer base every day.

Aureliana is a hard-working and self-sacrificing woman; she had to overcome a number of obstacles to manage to achieve everything that she currently has.

She asks for this loan to purchase animal vaccines, since in this way she will be able to continue growing and improving her life conditions.

loans.use: to purchase animal vaccinations

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas tiene 50  años, está casado con la señora  Maria con quien tienen dos hijos de los cuales 1 está cursando sus estudios universitarios en la facultad, y el otro está en la secundaria. Gracias al esfuerzo de ambos, todos los hijos tienen la posibilidad de recibir buena educación.
Tomas  emprendió su actividad como taxista hace más de 10 años actualmente tiene dos vehículos que realiza servicios de taxi, y de esa forma está luchando por seguir trabajando y dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida sin privaciones. Tomas es un señor muy sacrificado quien se esfuerza diariamente para brindarle lo mejor a su familia y buena educación a sus hijos para adquirir una profesión universitaria.
Necesita de este préstamo para la reparación de uno de sus vehículos, y de esa forma seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Tomas, 50 years old, is married to Maria, and they have two children, one of whom is pursuing university studies in the school, and the other is in the secondary school.  Thanks to both of their efforts, all the children have the possibility of getting a good education. 

Toman took on the job of taxi driving more than 10 years ago, and now has two vehicles which serve as taxis, and in this way he is fighting to continue working and to give his family everything they need for a live without deprivation. Tomas is a very self-sacrificing gentleman who exerts himself every day to offer the best to his family and a good education to his children to be able to obtain a university profession.

He needs this loan to repair one of his vehicles, and in this way, to continue working.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
La Sra. Elba tiene 46 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Itá. Su actividad se basa en la compra y venta de prendas de vestir, sabanas, frazadas, etc., sus ventas las realiza sobre pedido y cuenta con una clientela formada, además es propietaria de un Kiosko ubicado en frente a una escuela.
Elba es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que se está esforzando por poder crecer y salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de vestir y sabanas, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus ventas, luchando por poder crecer.
texts.en:
Elba is 46 years old and lives in the city of Itá. Her job is based on the purchase and sale of clothing, sheets, blankets, etc. Her sales are made mostly by order and she has a customer base. In addition, she is the owner of a kiosk situated in front of a school.

Elba is a very hard-working and enterprising person, who is exerting herself in order to grow and get ahead. She asks for this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of clothing and sheets, since in this way she will be able to continue with her sales, fighting to be able to grow.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and sheets to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy nails, paints among others.

loans.name: Yeney Ismari

texts.es: Yaney de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo,, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace  9 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en una zona muy transitada por esa razón posee mucha clientela, con lo que obtiene de sus  ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, yaney está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Yaney, 35 years old, lives in her own home with her life partner and their child. She has worked selling clothing for the past 9 years. Her business is located in an area with a lot of traffic, and for this reason she has many customers. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to pay the expenses that come up in her household. Yaney is asking for this loan to purchase clothing in bulk to be able to continue with her sales and, so, be able to have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Efren

texts.en:
Efren is 48 years old and married with one child. He is a man with determination and he shows his love for his work

Efren has managed one hectare of agricultural land for almost eight years. He is so thankful to his parents as it is because of his parents that he learned how to manage a rice field. 

Now, Efren is borrowing money amounting to 15,000 PHP to buy pesticide, fertilizer and seed to grow. He hopes that his business will do well so that he can give quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy pesticide, fertilizer and seed to grow

loans.name: Esteleta

texts.en:
As a married mother of nine children, Esteleta works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Esteleta is borrowing 8,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell in her fish vending business.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Rupali

texts.en:
Rupali is only thirty years old, married and a loving mother of two sons,  from a rural village called Kathapara in the district Jalpaiguri,.  She is a housewife. She is illiterate and can only sign her name.  She is married to Ganesh, 33 years old, who has a primary education. Their sons are students.  They are in grades 9 and 7. They live in their own kachha house (made of straw, mud and bamboo).

Rupali's husband earns a living through farming to support his family members.  He grows vegetables like beans, chilli, bottle gourd etc. and sells his produce in the local market .  Rupali also helps him in his work, but having been in this business for 10 years, he is unable to give a good and decent lifestyle to his family.

Rupali is a very active lady who wants to help her husband.  She has decided to start cucumber cultivation in their farmland.  With that aim she has taken a loan from BJS ( Kiva's partner) to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other agricultural inputs to grow cucumber. She hopes to grow more income to improve her family's standard of living and set aside some money from her business to construct a decent concrete-made house for them.

She is grateful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers to cultivate cucumbers.

loans.name: Dniza Carolain

texts.es:
Ella es Daniza, tiene 17 años, vive con los padres y la hermana  en el barrio puerta al llano, tiene una hija de 9 meses por la cual quiere salir adelante, para poder ofrecerle lo mejor y para que ella no tenga que pasar ninguna necesidad.
No ha sido fácil la vida a pesar de tener a los papas al lado, han pasado algunas circunstancias que la  ha desfavorecido para que pueda continuar con los estudios,  ella perdió el apoyo del  padre por el hecho de haber quedado en embarazo, la madre trabaja cuando le sale en un satélite y la hermana está  estudiando, al igual que Daniza no tiene recursos disponibles para poderla ayudar.
Ella desde muy pequeña siempre ha querido estudiar farmacia, pues le parece una carrera muy interesante, sabe que con esa carrera va aprender cada día mas y lo más importante sabe que con esta carrera ella más adelante podrá estudiar algo similar, pues también sueña con estudiar enfermería, quiere aprender cada día mas para que la  pequeña hija pueda admirarla no solo como madre sino también como mujer, para que tome un ejemplo y se dé cuenta que a pesar de que ella quedo en embarazo tan joven no dejo los estudios votados, si no al contrario, lucho cada día por salir adelante.  
A ella le entusiasma bastante esta carrera, es por eso que ella solicita el convenio con kiva, porque para ella es importante terminar esta carrera y poder tener un mejor futuro para la hija.
texts.en:
This is Daniza. She is 17 years old and lives with her parents and her sister in the neighbourhood of Puerta al Llano. She has a nine-month-old daughter, for whom she wants to succeed, to offer her the best in life and so that she never has to go without anything.

Her life has never been easy, despite having her parents by her side. Certain circumstances made it difficult for her to continue with her studies. For example, she lost the support of her father after getting pregnant. Her mother works when she can and her sister is studying like Daniza, and has no available resources to help her.

She has always, from a young age, wanted to study pharmacy, as it seems a very interesting degree to her. She knows that with this degree, she will learn more each day. Most importantly, it will allow her to study something similar in the future, as she also dreams of studying nursing. She wants to learn more every day so that her young daughter looks up to her not only as a mother but also as a woman. She wants to be an example to her, so that she learns that despite the fact that her mother got pregnant at such a young age, she did not abandon her chosen studies, rather, she fought each and every day to succeed.

She is very enthusiastic about this degree, which is why she is requesting help from Kiva, because for her, it is important to finish this degree and achieve a better future for her daughter.

loans.use: to pay one semester's university fees.

loans.name: Mamani

texts.en:
Mamani resides in a small village, Kothapara, in Jalpaiguri district. She is only 30 years old and studied up to grade 8. She is married to Krishna, aged 30 years.  They have no children.  They live in their own kachha house (made of straw, bamboo and mud).

Like most other villagers, Mamani's husband does farming in order to earn money to support his family. He has a small plot of land.  He cultivates vegetables, mainly potatoes.  He tries hard to produce quality vegetables to satisfy his customers. He sells his produce in the local markets with the help of his wife.  But his income is barely enough to cover all the necessary expenses of his family. He wants to diversify his business to meet the demand of his customers.  Now he wants to grow eggplant in his farmland, in order to earn extra income for his family.

Mamani wants to help her husband by taking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).  She wants to utilize the loan to purchase eggplant seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

Mamani believes that the loan from BJS will enable her to generate more profit from her business and  uplift her family's lifestyle., In the future, she wants to save money to purchase more land.

She thanks BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase eggplant seeds, fertilizers and pesticide for cultivating eggplant in their farmland.

loans.name: Lebuja

texts.en:
Lebuja is a resident of a remote region in Jalpaiguri district. She is only 29 years old and is completely uneducated, can only sign her name. She was deprived of an education due to the poor economic condition of her parents. Now she is married and a loving mother of four school-going children. They are in grade 9,7,5 and 3.

Lebuja is a housewife and her husband Julas, aged 42 years, is a farmer by trade. As the only earning member for the family, he does farming.  Lebuja helps in his work as much as possible, specially at the time of harvesting and selling. His family's primary income comes from growing different vegetables.  He is a hardworking and sincere person and works hard to give them a decent lifestyle, but he is unable to do so because of his meager income. He needs to earn more to meet all the costs of such a big family.  He plants to cultivate eggplant, which is a profitable vegetable, but his main challenge is capital.

Lebuja has taken financial help from BJS to buy fertilizers and seedings.  As a hard-working mother, she strongly believes that the loan’s profit will enable her to upgrade the family situation and live under better conditions. Her first priority is her children's education, and she wants to see them established.

She will be ever grateful to BJS and Kiva for the financial help.

loans.use: To purchase eggplant seedlings and fertilizers to cultivate eggplant.

loans.name: Laxmi

texts.en:
Laxmi is 29 years old, married and blessed with three children (two sons and one daughter).  She studied up to fourth grade.  Her husband Sahadev, aged 41 years, is illiterate and can sign his name only. Their sons are grown up and work as daily laborers in other states of India and their daughter is in grade 1.  They live in their own house in Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district.

Laxmi's husband is a greengrocer.  He buys vegetables from village farmers and sells them in the local market. His inconsistent income is insufficient to cover the family's household expenses.  Laxmi is a responsible and hardworking woman.  To help her husband in running the family smoothly, she practices cattle breeding.   She initially started her business three years ago with the purchase of one dairy cow.  Now she has three goats as well.  She sells milk on a daily basis to her neighbours. Now she wants to purchase one more cow to start making milk products (butter, fresh cheese called paneer, and curd) to satisfy her customers.

She heard that BJS gives business loans to rural women.  She has asked for a loan with the aim of further developing her business by buying one more cow. She hopes that now her business will help her to generate more income to give financial sustenance to her family.

Laxmi plans to invest income to purchase more cows and make a cattle herd in the future.

She gives hearty thanks to her lenders (BJS and Kiva).

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to grow her existing dairy business.

loans.name: Ada Lila

texts.es: Ada Lila es una persona honrada, trabajadora, se dedica al Comercio de cerdos, su compañero de vida labora para una empresa minera y colabora en los gastos del hogar, a pesar de ser una familia unida no cuenta con los recursos suficientes para la compra de las puertas para su vivienda que han mejorando con sacrificio y créditos obtenidos.  solicita  financiamiento para compra e instalación de puertas y de esta manera contar con privacidad en su hogar.  posteriormente pretende continuar con las mejoras en su vivienda que actualmente tiene paredes de tabla las que pondría serian de concreto, mejorando las condiciones de vida principalmente para sus dos hijas.
texts.en:
Ada Lila is an honest, hardworking person who trades pigs for a living. Her life partner works in a mining company and helps with the household expenses. In spite of being a close family, they don’t have the enough resources to buy doors for their house, which with a lot of sacrifice and loans, they have managed to improve. 

She is requesting this loan to buy and install the doors. This will give them more privacy at their own home. She expects to continue with the home improvements. Currently, the walls are made out of wood boards, but they could be of concrete. This would improve their living conditions, specially those of her two daughters.

loans.use: to buy doors for her house.

loans.name: Dipika

texts.en:
Dipika is from the small village Bairatiguri in Jalpaiguri district.  She is only 28 years old. She is married to Pradip.  They are blessed with three children (one son and two daughters).  Dipika studied till grade 7;  her husband is uneducated, but they are providing education to all their children who are in grades 8, 6 and 3. The family is very friendly, close-knit, and all the family members have good relationships with one another.

Dipika's husband is engaged in agricultural business.  His income is not sufficient to meet all the expenses of the family. Dipika is goal-driven, responsible and considerate.  As an additional source of income for her family, she practices livestock breeding.  She started this business five years back with an initial purchase of cattle. With her hard work and dedication she has increased her livestock and now she has one milk cow, three goats, and one buffalo.  She gets earnings from the sale of milk and milk products (cheese, butter, curd, etc.)

For the purpose of further development of her business, Dipika has taken a loan from BJS to purchase a cow to enhance her business.  The earnings from the business will strengthen her family economy and fulfill her dreams of giving her children a better education.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her existing milk supply business.

loans.name: Renu

texts.en:
Renu is 32 years old, married and mother of two sons. The family lives in Jarmundi village, Jharkhand. Her elder son is studying ITI and her younger son is in 10th grade. Her husband earns a living working as an electrician. Renu started a goat rearing business to help her husband maintain the family. She has seven goats in her farm and has been in this business from the last five years. She raises, fattens and resells livestock for a good price at a local bazaar and earns around 30,000 INR per annum. 

Animal husbandry is very widespread in Jharkhand as there is a high demand for milk and meat. A few of the local restaurants get their supply of meat from Renu. 

With all the hard work, Renu is still finding it hard to cover all the expenses. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 INR to buy a goat which will help her improve her farm’s productivity.

 Renu wants to save enough money for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy a goat

loans.name: Sarifa

texts.en:
Sarifa is from a small village in the district Jalpaiguri.  She is only 26 years old and studied up to grade 5.  She is married and together with her husband, is raising three school-going children (one son and two daughters). Sarifa could not continue her studies due to her parents' poor financial resources; she is trying hard to give a proper education to her children.  Her children are in grade 9, grade 5 and grade 4 respectively.

Sarifa's husband Aliul is engaged in agriculture. He owns and operates a farm and has been engaged in his business for more than ten years. This tradition has been passed on from generation to generation; that's how he learnt agricultural activities. He is a humble and hardworking man. Sarifa also helps her husband.  They give hard toil on their farmland.  It is the only means to earn their living. Her husband grows mainly vegetables and sells them in the local markets and to his neighbors to generate income to contribute to the family economy.  With an aim to expanding their business, they want to cultivate eggplant in their farmland.

Sarifa is requesting a loan from BJS to purchase eggplant seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to continue cultivating and caring for her crops and obtain a more productive harvest.  With the spirit to get ahead and the determination to prosper, she wants to continue with the business and make it more and more profitable so that she can give her family a better quality of life.  At the same time she wants to give a proper education to her children so that they can be established in life.

She gives her heartiest thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, etc. for cultivating eggplant

loans.name: Leydy  Yohana

texts.es:
Leidy es una afortuna mujer de 28 años de edad pues tiene un feliz noviazgo con el que nacieron dos hermosas hijas las cuales la inspiraron para enfocar una idea de negocio y es así como hace 4 años se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama y niña y la elaboración de peinados para niñas con el afán de poder ofrecerles una excelente calidad de vida con una buena educación, alimentación y techo convirtiéndose sus dos hijas en su fuente de inspiración y fuerza.
A medida que crecen sus hijas, crece la preocupación de leído ya que siempre quiere que ellas tenga lo mejor en materia de educación y es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para la compra de mercancía(ropa para dama y niña) e insumos para realizar los peinados con el afán de generar un mejor volumen de recursos para pagarles una buena educación a sus dos princesas, también junto a su pareja se trazaron la meta de comprar una casa propia para dejarles una herencia a sus hijas y en el caso de que ellos dos les lleguen a faltar tengan un hogar donde llegar
texts.en:
Leidy is a fortunate 28-year old woman, as she has a happy partnership and two beautiful daughters, who inspired her to focus on a business idea. This is how, for four years, she has made a living selling women's and children's clothing and creating hairstyles for girls, with the aim of being able to offer her daughters an excellent quality of life with a good education, diet and home, converting her two daughters into her source of inspiration and strength.

As her daughters grow, Leidy worries about them, as she always wants them to have the best education possible. This is why she is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (women's and children's clothing) and products to create girls' hairstyles, with the aim of increasing her earnings so that she can pay for her two princesses to have a good education.

Her and her partner have also set the goal of buying their own home, so as to leave their daughters a legacy, and should they ever need it, a home in which to live.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (women's and children's clothing) and products to create girls' hairstyles.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe, who is 54 years old already, is a widow with six children. Some of her children are adults and some are of school age.

She had already availed herself of a loan in the cooperative previously and is currently reapplying for a new loan for additional stock of shoes for sale. Her major source of income is still through the buying and selling of used shoes. She has been in this business for six years now. Within her six years in this business, she has had a good return on her investment and that is why she is increasing her inventory.

The income from this business helped her in financing the education of her children. She hopes that she can have her own house by continuing and improving this kind of business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of shoes for re-sale

location.town: Dipolog-Lower Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del

loans.name: Elinor

texts.en:
Ms. Elinor, 45, is single and a self-employed woman. She is a new member of the cooperative and availed herself of a loan to provide financing for her business.

She is engaged in an aqua farming business. With a four (4) hectares fishpond, she is culturing milkfish and lobsters. She can harvest them after three to four months and deliver them to regular customers/buyers. She has been in this business for fourteen years already and she knows the very best technique in managing such a line of business. Apparently, this business has a good income as long as there are no natural calamities within the area.

As she continues managing this business, her profits will be invested more on aquaculture to support her living.

loans.use: to purchase milkfish fingerlings for her fishpond

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is 51 years old, married and a resident of Lower Salut Daku, Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. She earns a living through farming.

She has been a member of PMPC for 1 year and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the cooperative. Now she is applying for a loan of 15,000 PHP to pay for labor in land preparation and to buy farm inputs.

Isabel deeply wishes to maintain being a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to pay for labor in land preparation and to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Cherilyn

texts.en:
Cherilyn is 30 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Cherilyn and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Cherilyn is taking out a housing loan amounting to 7,000 PHP to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. She has been an NWTF borrower since 2011.

With your help, Cherilyn can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Sheena

texts.en: As the married mother of two children, Sheena works hard to support her family. She earns a living by running a manicure business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. She is requesting a loan for PHP 8,000 from NWTF to buy new manicure supplies. Sheena has sustained her business activities through two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Khateja

texts.en:
Khateja is a young woman of only 27 years.  She lives in Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district with her husband Ismail and five children (one son and four daughters).  Three of them go to school, and two are too young for school. Khateja is a homemaker.  She did not have access to formal education but she can sign her name.

Khateja's husband works in his own farmland, which is their main source of income. He grows different vegetables in different seasons.  He sells his produce in the local markets as well as to people who come to purchase from them. His enthusiastic personality is something that really characterizes this young entrepreneur and it is reflected in the work that he does on his small farm.  His main challenge is lacking capital for which reason he can't expand his business. Thus he is unable to give sufficient financial sustenance to his family.  

Khateja and her husband plan to grow jute in their farmland. So she is asking for a loan from BJS with the purpose of cultivating jute which is a very profitable crop.  She wants to utilize the loan to purchase jute seeds, fertilizers and other necessary agricultural inputs to start cultivation in the coming rainy season, which is the best time to sow the crop. She hopes the business will provide them with good profit to run the family smoothly.

She is very much grateful to her lenders (BJS and Kiva) for their financial assistance.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for cultivating jute.

loans.name: Ella

texts.en: Ella is 24 years old, married and the mother of one child who is in school. Her house was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8. She has restarted her business and is committed to regain what she lost. To make this possible, she is taking out a PHP 8,500 housing loan through NWTF to buy building materials and hire construction workers to build a replacement home for her family. Ella joined NWTF last year in order to work her way out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to build her new home and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and hire construction workers.

loans.name: Marly

texts.es:
Marly se desempeña como vendedora de salón de una telefonía, es estudiante de la Carrera Ingeniería Comercial, donde está cursando el tercer año, es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora.
Ella estudia y trabaja para salir adelante y solventar los gastos de su familia, vive en casa propia, es muy dedicada a su estudio ya que siempre desea alcanzar sus metas. Su sueño es de terminar esta carrera y el día de mañana enseñar en las Universidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene, y que es un poco alto. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Marly works in sales in a call center. She's in her third year of study in the commercial engineering program.  She's a very responsible, honest, and hardworking person.  She studies and works to get ahead and pay her family expenses.  She lives in her own house and is very devoted to her studies because she has always wanted to achieve her goals.

Marly's dream is to finish school and, in the future, teach at the college level.

She's requesting this loan to pay her final degrees expenses. That way she'll be able to cover her expense, which is a bit high.

She's grateful to have this opportunity.

loans.use: to pay for her final degree expenses

loans.name: Reymundo

texts.en:
Reymundo is 33 years old, single, and a resident of Dontulan, Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. He earns a living through farming corn, coconut, and rice.

He has been a member of PMPC for 2 years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now he is applying for a loan of PHP 10,000  to buy fertilizers and farming tools.

Reymundo deeply wishes to maintain being a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farming tools.

loans.name: Jayder Esteban

texts.es: Jayder, ha heredado de su padre el conocimiento y manejo del Campo, su mayor fuente de ingreso depende de la venta de queso y productos  agrícolas,  necesita reparar las cercas de sus potreros por lo que solicita crédito para comprar alambre de puas, grapas, postes y pagar mano de obra para esta inversión.  Desea continuar con las mejoras en su finca y aumenta su hato ganadero.
texts.en:
Jayder inherited from his father the knowledge of how to manage the land. His main source of income comes from selling cheese and agricultural products. 

He needs to repair the fence of his pastureland, and that’s why he is requesting this loan to buy barbed wire, staples, and poles, and to pay for the labor. 

He wishes to continue with the improvements in his farm and to increase his herd.

loans.use: to buy barbed wire, staples and poles.

loans.name: Tunaweza Group

texts.en: Yunis, who was born 1980s, is married and blessed with a baby girl. She has supported her family by selling fruits and vegetables for a year now. She begins her sales at 8 a.m. and stops at 9 p.m. every working day and is able to make a fair profit each month. Yunis is requesting her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She repaid her first loan, after using it to replenish her supply of produce. She used part of the profits she made to buy food for her family and pay for some construction work. This new loan will be apportioned among the members of Tunaweza, a three-member loan group whose members will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan. Yunis' goal for the future is to run a larger business which serves more people.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Irma

texts.es: Gloria de 31 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de trapeadores y sobrefundas, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su hijo y su esposo, gloria está solicitando un crédito para comprar tela por mayor para seguir elaborando más productos y así obtener mejores ingresos darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Gloria, 31, earns a living making and selling mops and pillowcases. She manages to pay her household expenses with what she earns from her sales and her husband's help. She lives in her own home with her son and her husband.

Gloria's requesting a loan to buy fabric wholesale to keep on making more products.  That way she'll earn more income to give her family a better quality of life without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla is 51 years old, married, and a resident of Lower Salug Daku, Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. She earns a living through retail business such as AVON, Natasha, and MSE.

She has been a member of PMPC for 6 years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now she is applying for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy cement, metal, nails, wood and to pay for labor to finish building her house.

Perla deeply wishes to maintain being a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal, nails, wood, and labor to finish building her house

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Violeta works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling fruit in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice grains and pig fattening. Violeta is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of fruit for her fruit stand business.

Violeta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fruit for her fruit stand

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and been in NWTF since 2012, and she is now requesting a PHP 8,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor so she can build a house for her family.

With your help, Emily will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Emily would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Rosa requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries like snack foods, vegetables, and other spices. She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Rosa would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like snack foods, vegetables, and other spices.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 48 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Gemma works very hard to provide for them.

Gemma's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Gemma has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Gemma has taken a PHP 9,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Gemma is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Ellen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling coconut in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase additional coconut to sell for her business selling coconut.

Ellen has been in this business for 5 years. Ellen earns additional income from food vending, raising pigs, and farming coconut.

Ellen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconut to sell

loans.name: Ramiro Luis

texts.es:
En la vida hay que buscar oportunidades de progreso e independencia al igual que lo hizo Ramiro que cansado del duro trabajo como auxiliar de bodega, decidió montar su propio negocio de billar y venta de licor y frituras con la liquidación recibida de su antiguo trabajo y con algunos ahorros.
Inicio con su negocio hace 1 mes y ya tiene grandes planes para su consolidación.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de frituras y otros alimentos para darse la oportunidad de aumentar sus ventas e impactar sus ingresos de una manera muy positiva.
Estos ingresos serán invertidos en el sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en:
In life, one has to look for opportunities for progress and independence like Ramiro did. He was tired of tough work as a stockroom assistant. He decided to launch his own pool hall, liquor and snack business with the settlement received from his old job and with some savings. He started with his business one month ago and he already has great plans for its consolidation.

He is applying for a loan to buy a stock of snacks and other foods to give him an opportunity to increase his sales and impact his income in a positive manner. This income will be invested in sustaining his home.

loans.use: to buy snacks and liquor to increase his inventory and improve the income in his pool hall.

loans.name: Elba Ines

texts.es:
8 años de experiencia son los que caracterizan y dan constancia del excelente trabajo de la señora Elba que se desenvuelve como peluquera en un local ubicado en su residencia. Elba es una mujer que constantemente asiste a seminarios de estilista para estar enterada de las nuevas tendencias y cortes que se están manejando para poder realizar cualquier corte que le soliciten.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de una vitrina para exhibir de una mejor manera los productos que recomienda a sus clientes, con el resto del capital quiere realizar la compra de la última generación de equipos para peluquería ya que siempre le gusta estar a la vanguardia con la tecnología hablando laboralmente claro. Su gran sueño es poder tener su local fuera de su casa y emplear personas
texts.en: Eight years of experience characterize and lend witness to the excellent service provided by Elba. She carries out her work as a hair dresser from a shop located in her house. Elba is a woman who continually goes to hairdressing seminars to keep abreast of new styles and cuts so that she can mange any haircut that is requested. She is asking for a loan to buy a display case to better display the products that she recommends to her clients. She'll use the rest of the capital to purchase the latest generation of hair cutting equipment as she always likes to be in the vanguard in technology for her work. Her great dream is to have a shop that is located away from her house and be able to employ people.

loans.use: to buy a display case and better beauty salon equipment.

loans.name: Adrian Ernesto

texts.es:
Con tan solo 18 años de edad Adrián ya se enfoca en proteger los derechos de cada uno de los habitantes de su ciudad. Es un joven emprendedor y disciplinado, quiere estar al día con las nuevas tecnologías, asegura que son una herramienta importante para todos los jovenes ya que pueden contar con la información necesaria y veraz. Por eso requiere un préstamo para la compra de una Laptop y así mantenerse al día con la información más relevante en torno a su carrera. 
Sus planes futuros son terminar la carrera y ejercerse profesionalmente, luego realizar un posgrado.
texts.en:
With only 18 years of age, Adrián is already focused on protecting the rights of every one of the residents of his city. He is a young entrepreneur and is disciplined. He wants to be up to date with new technologies. He assures that they are an important tool for all young people since they can count on necessary and true information. But this requires a loan for the purchase of a laptop so that he can stay current with the most relevant information for his degree.

His future plans are to finish studying and work professionally, and later do a master's.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 26 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y también al cultivo de sandia y melón, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. Y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y así poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower is 26 years old and lives at a relative's house with his partner and two children. The borrower makes a living growing basic grains and also grows melon and watermelon. The borrower then sells his products at the different markets near his home. He uses his profits to cover some household costs. This borrower is applying for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments, weed-killer and more. The borrower will also  make improvements to his land (shown in the photograph) and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments, weed-killer and more, and to make improvements to the land.

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es: Marvin es un joven de bajos recursos económicos que busca la manera de salir adelante con sus estudios la carrera de Ing. en sistemas, el tiene muchos anhelos de triunfar y poder ayudar a su familia con un mejor salario, en la actualidad labora para el ministerio de educación como Kardista, solicita el crédito para pagar el curso de titulación de su profesión el cual está en la etapa final.
texts.en: Marvin is a poor young man who is looking to get ahead through his computer programming studies. Marvin has many wishes and wants to help his family by earning a higher salary. Marvin currently works for the Department for Education. Marvin is applying for a loan in order to pay for his degree title.

loans.use: to buy for his degree title.

loans.name: Mercurio

texts.en:
Mercurio previously received a 10,000 PHP loan that he utilized to purchase more LPG (liquefied petroleum gas) tanks to expand his product inventory. His earnings were a big help for his children's education and for personal, household and business expenditures.

He would like to apply for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy more LPG tanks to expand his product inventory. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain his family's daily needs and his children's education. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Mercurio hopes to be more successful in business and dreams to give his children a good life and education. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more LPG tanks to expand his product inventory.

loans.name: Subia

texts.en:
Subia is 38 years old.  She is married and blessed with two children.  She has been farming for five years. Subia would like to improve her farming to support her family. She would like a loan with which she will buy more seed for planting and therefore increase her crop yield and income. She has successfully repaid all her previous loans. She would like a loan of PHP 20,000.

With her anticipated profits, she will improve her farming. In the future, she hopes to be a successful farmer.

loans.use: to buy more seed.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en: Luz, 53 years of age, is married and blessed with two children. She has owned and operated a transportation business in her village for almost two years and is earning a net income of PHP 800 daily.  Together with her husband, she is striving hard to earn more profits for the welfare of their family. Due to insufficient capital to continue her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 13,000 to pay for the repairs and maintenance of their jeepney. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: To pay for the repairs and maintenance of her jeepney.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda is 47 years old and has four children. She is married and two of her children are currently in school.

Glenda and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. Glenda is taking out a housing loan amounting to 2,500 PHP to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. She has been an NWTF borrower since 2012.

With your help, Glenda can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 32 years old, and married with four children, two of whom are in school. 

Remedios is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Remedios would like to save enough money so she can send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chicks and feed for her poultry business

loans.name: Katherine Abinel

texts.es:
Retazos de tela, tijera, hilos y una máquina de coser de juguete eran los instrumentos favoritos de Katherine cuando era una niña, la costura se ha convertido en su pasión por lo que ha decidido estudiar y profesionalizarse en ello. Ella tiene 19 años de edad, está soltera y cursa segundo año de costura. Sus padres son su principal fuente de motivación, desean brindarle un futuro prospero y lleno de oportunidades, razón por la que es una joven emprendedora, trabajadora e inteligente. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de una computadora laptop, herramienta que le facilitará realizar investigaciones y entregar tareas en tiempo y forma. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento, ya que invertirá el dinero que usa en los cibercafés en un instrumento propio. Una de sus metas es crear una página web en la que pueda dar a conocer los productos que ofrece así como la ropa que crea, a un público más amplio. Asegura que los estudios y el uso de la nueva tecnología, la llevaran a ser una persona de éxito.
texts.en:
Remnants of materials, scissors, threads and a toy sewing machine were Katherine's favourite things when she was a girl. Sewing has become her passion and so she has decided to study it and become a professional dressmaker. Katherine is 19 years old. She is single and in second year of her sewing course. Katherine's parents are her source of motivation; they want to give their daughter a prosperous future full of opportunities and, because of this, Katherine is enterprising, intelligent and hard-working.

Katherine is applying for a loan in order to buy a laptop computer, which will allow her to do research and submit assignments on time and in the correct format. Katherina is putting her trust in this loan as she will use it to invest in her own computer. One of Katherine's goals is to create a webpage where a greater number of people can learn about her products, including the clothes that she makes. Katherine assures that her studies and her use of new technology will make her a successful person.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clay in bulk

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.es: Dionisio de 42 años de edad, se dedica a la compra y venta de material reciclable en una pequeña "chatarrería". Los principales productos que compra son el carton, hierro, cobre bronce y aluminio; cuando inició su negocio, hace 4 años,lo hizo porque debió desplazarse al municipio donde habita y necesitaba generar ingresos en su nueva vida y la de su familia; así fue como contando con un capital de trabajo, y experiencia en el oficio de reciclaje,  dió curso a su negocio, para sacar adelante a sus dos hijas menores de edad. En su negocio el material reciclable lo compra diariamente, atendiendo desde las 7 de la mañana, hasta las 6 de la tarde en un local donde se encuentra ubicado y hasta allí llegan los vendedores de manera individual.  Sus clientes son mayoristas, que son empresas organizadas  y que cada dia solicitan un mayor volumen, pero su gran desafio es tener un capital de trabajo suficiente, para responder oportunamente. En la ctualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará material reciclable, como carton, hierro, cobre bronce y aluminio, su inversión impactará sus utilidades por el volumen de compras de sus productos y por el incremento que proyecta ocurrirá en sus ventas, lo cual mejorará sustancialmente su negocio, haciendo de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Dionisio is 42 years old and he works buying and selling recyclable materials in a small scrapyard. The main products that he buys are cardboard, steel, copper, bronze and aluminum. When he began the business 4 years ago he did so because he had been displaced from the municipality where he lived and had to generate income for his family in his new life.

As he had some working capital and experience in the recycling field, he started his business in order to support his two young children. He buys the materials daily from 7 in the morning until 6 in the evening in his work place. Sellers come there one by one. His clients are wholesalers which are organized businesses who each day want more volume.

His big challenge is to have sufficient capital to respond to this. So he is requesting a loan from Kiva, his first loan from la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which he will use to buy recyclable material like cardboard, steel, copper, bronze and aluminum. This investment will impact his profits through the volume of product he can buy and the projected increase that will happen with his sales. This will improve his business substantially making this loan from Kiva a success.

loans.use: to buy recyclable material like cardboard, steel, copper, bronze and aluminum.

loans.name: Geoma

texts.es: Geoma es soltera pero tiene un hijo, ella vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe, ella esta en calidad de cuidadora del lugar pero su fuente de ingresos principal es la artesanía y necesita un credito para comprar lana, Geoma es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar y necesita su ayuda.
texts.en: Geoma is single but has a child. She lives in El Alto in an adobe house where she is the caretaker, but her main source of income is her handicrafts business. She needs a loan to buy wool. She is the only income earner for her family and needs your help.

loans.use: to buy wool for her business.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Rosalinda works hard to support her family.

She has a business weaving bamboo in the Philippines and also earns additional income from goat raising.  Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock of bamboo to sell for her business weaving bamboo.

Rosalinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of bamboo to sell

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net and gasoline for her business, which she has been in for five years now.

In the future, Julia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net and gasoline for her business.

loans.name: Sahaya

texts.en:
Sahaya works hard to support her family. Sahaya is married and has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 9 years now.

Sahaya requested a 29,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 59 years old, married with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Cecilia has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries like noodles, canned goods and other groceries. Cecilia has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future, Cecilia would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like noodles, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es: Luz de 36 años de edd habita  con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 12 y 21 años. Desde hace 3 años inició su experiencia comercial vendiendo productos con su suegra mediante guias especializadas de negocios o catalogos. Los principales productos de su oferta es la ropa, los cosméticos, dulces, etc. vendiendo desde su casa  de contado  y a créditos, mediante pedidos que hacen sus clientes.  Todos los dias desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche Luz atiende en su negocio a vecinos, referidos por estos familiares y a la comunidad en general si requiere cualquiera de los productos de su oferta. Su meta es tener un local de gran tamaña aumentar sus ventas y finalmente comprar su propia casa. En la actualidad está aplicando a unc redikiva, primer finaciemitnoq ue hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa, útiles escolares, accesorios femeninos etc. Con esta inversión el negocio de Luz exhibirá una gran variedad de productos, e impulsará las ventas desde el manejo de la imagen con muchos articulos. y esto es lo que justamente hace que su inversión tenga potncialidad de éxito.
texts.en:
Luz, 36, lives with her spouse and two children aged 12 and 21. Three years ago, she started her commercial experience selling products with her mother in law through specialized business handbooks and catalogs. The main products she offers are clothes, cosmetics, sweets, etc. She sells from her house by cash and at credit, through orders that her customers make. Every day, from 8 in the morning until 8 at night, Luz attends to neighbors in her business, referred by family members and the community in general if they require the products that she offers. Her goal is to have a shop of great size to increase her sales and ultimately buy her own house. 

Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan. This is her first loan that she is doing with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, by which she will buy clothing, school supplies, feminine accessories, etc. With this investment, Luz's business will display a great variety of products and will boost sales from the management of the image of many products. This is exactly what she will do to so her investment will have potential of success.

loans.use: to buy clothing, school supplies, feminine accessories, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing, blankets and footwear.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel  es un veterano hombre de 67 años de edad que se dedica a la actividad de confección y comercialización de prendas de vestir, actividad que realiza junto a su esposa por más de 20 años y que gracias a su hija quien tomo cursos y capacitaciones la perfecciono. Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos, materias primas, y mercancía para poder atender a la demanda de sus clientes, lo que caracteriza A Manuel es la pureza y honradez que tiene algo que respetan muchos sus clientes de él, el crédito lo beneficiara de gran manera ya que tiene pedidos y es mercancía que ya tiene vendida con lo que sacara un gran provecho. El gran sueño de juan es que su negocio sea estable puesto que por su edad nadie lo emplearía, poder aprender nuevas técnicas de confección para tener más variedad de surtido con el que puedan tener una placentera vida
texts.en:
Manuel is a 67-year-old veteran who manufactures and sells clothing. He has been doing this activity for more than 20 years with his wife and thanks to his daughter who takes courses and does training to perfect it. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies, raw materials and merchandise to meet his clients’ demands. What characterizes Manuel is his candor and integrity he shows to his clients. The loan will be a big help as he has orders and has already sold his merchandise.

 Juan’s dream is for his business to be stable because at his age no one will hire him, and to learn new dressmaking techniques to have more variety so he can have a pleasant life.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of supplies and raw materials to meet his clients’ demands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and footwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 56-year-old Benjamin from Harare. He is married with five children, and three are attending school.  Benjamin runs a retail business selling shoe soles. The business has been in operation for 2 years. He says the main challenge faced is stiff competition from other players which results in him reducing the prices of his goods. 

Benjamin has requested a loan of $300 to buy shoe soles for resale. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to increase the stock of shoe soles and shoe components and eventually improve the profits. In the future, Benjamin plans to own a shoe factory manufacturing shoes, especially school shoes. He says he is grateful to Kiva and Microking for giving loans at reasonable interest rates and payment terms.

loans.use: to purchase more shoe soles and other shoe components

loans.name: Tadzeyi

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 41-year-old Tadzeyi from Harare. She is married with two children, and both are attending school. She also cares for two other dependents. Tadzeyi runs a retail business selling groceries. The business has been in operation for 3 years. She says the main challenges faced are cash flow challenges which hinder growth. 

Tadzeyi has requested a loan of $750 to buy grocery stock for her kiosk. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to increase turnover and boost profits. In the future, Tadzeyi plans to operate a conventional shop.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her kiosk

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es casado y tiene 3 hijos Juan  vive en El alto en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad Juan se dedica a la elaboración de calzados deportivos para futbol y ese trabajo hace que Juan este sentando durante mucho tiempo lo cual le ocasiona dolores en el cuerpo, su vista también esta en riesgo pues se expone a quimicos para el armado de los calzados Juan necesita un credito para comprar cuero, pegamento, unos lentes de protección y herramientas para que su esposa la pueda ayudar en la fabricacion de los zapatos deportivos
texts.en:
Juan is married and has three children. He lives in El Alto, in an adobe house that he owns. Juan earns a living by making soccer shoes. Juan is seated for a long time when carrying out this work, which means that he sometimes has aches and pains. His sight is also at risk since he is exposed to the chemicals used to reinforce the shoes. 

Juan needs a loan to buy leather, glue, safety glasses, and tools, so that his wife can help him make sports shoes.

loans.use: to buy leather, glue, safety glasses, and tools, so that his wife can help make sports shoes.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz esta casada, tiene 4 hijos y vive con sus suegros en El Alto La familia ocupa una casa de adobe  que le pertenece a sus padres Beatriz se gana la vida como artesana que especificamente fabrica zapatos Beatriz quiere un credito  para comprar materiales como cuero y pasta para fabricar zapatos Beatriz es por el momento la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Beatriz is married with four children, and lives with her in-laws in El Alto. The family lives in an adobe house that belongs to Beatriz's parents. She earns a living as a craftswoman who, more specifically, makes shoes. Beatriz needs a loan to buy materials such as leather and glue to make shoes. Currently, Beatriz is the only income earner in her household, which is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy materials such as leather and glue to make shoes.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel es casado y tiene 6 hijos Dsniel vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe donde paga un alquiler Daniel se dedica a la elaboración de sombreros para hombre y mujer Daniel solicita un credito para comprar material que le permita fabricar sombreros, ademas se acercan las fiestas folklóricas como Gran Poder y también necesita hacer sombreros que se usan en los bailes folkloricos Daniel es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Daniel is married and has 6 children. He lives in El Alto in an adobe house where he pays rent. Daniel dedicates himself to making hats for men and women.

He is requesting a loan for purchasing materials that will allow him to continue making hats. The folkloric festivals are coming, including the Great Power event, and he needs to make hats for that as well as for other folk dances which are approaching.

Daniel is the only source of income in his family and for this reason, he needs your help.

loans.use: to buy materials for making hats.

loans.name: Mahsuda

texts.ru: Махсуда является одной из энергичных женщин, которые продают лепешки на местном рынке. Она имеет свой цех, где производит лепешки. Махсуда арендует помещение. Она имеет одного работника-пекаря. Махсуда обычно оптом покупает муку и потом использует для своего бизнеса. Она занимается этим бизнесом уже более 13 лет. Махсуда данное время нуждается финансовой поддержке, так как она должна купить муку. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки муки, чтобы увеличить оборотный капитал. Махсуда надеется, что этот займ поможет ей развевать бизнес и с полученного дохода она будет обеспечить своего единственного ребенка высшим образованием. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mahsuda is one of the energetic women who sell flatbread at the local market, a business she has been working in for more than 13 years. She has her own shop where she makes the bread, and rents a stall for selling it. She has one employee who bakes for her. Mahsuda usually buys flour wholesale and then uses it for her business. Currently she needs financial support since she needs to buy flour. She is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni to purchase flour in order to increase her working capital. She hopes that this loan will help her to develop her business and that she will be able to send her only child to university with the profits received. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy flour to increase her working capital in baking and selling flatbread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shellfish and dark and white fish for her business.

loans.name: Msasani Group

texts.en:
Khadija is a married mother of one son who is in school. She is in her thirties, and for four years now, she has had a mama lishe (cafe) business, selling breakfast, lunch and dinner food. She serves people from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a good profit each month.

Khadija is requesting her 15th loan through Tujijenge Tanzania. With her previous loans, all of which were paid back successfully, she bought a car for a taxi business and improved her business with more inventory. Khadija earned a profit which she used to cover school fees and household expenses. She is so proud to have Kiva's loan support. She will use this new loan to buy a deep freezer for her mama lishe. Her ambition is to greatly improve her business and grow other projects in farming and poultry. 

Khadija will share this loan with her loan group "Msasani" which has a total of two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a deep freezer for her mama lishe business.

loans.name: Jeferson Armando

texts.es:
Jeferson vive en la ciudad de Pisco, es un joven de 21 años que se dedica a su trabajo como empleado en una empresa de acero de su ciudad, este humilde empleo es su única fuente de ingresos para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque con ello puede solventar los gastos de estudios ya que actualmente cursa la carrera de mecánica y soldadura en un instituto de su ciudad.

Jeferson esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una moto, con lo cual podrá ayudarlo a movilizarse a su trabajo ya que se encuentra lejos de su ciudad, asi podrá ahorrar dinero en gastos de pasajes y podrá seguir trabajando y esforzándose para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su propia empresa”.
texts.en:
Jeferson lives in the city of Pisco. He is a young man of 21 years who is dedicated to his work as an employee of a steel business in his city. This humble work is his only source of income to be able to get ahead. Above all with this, he can cover school expenses since he is currently in a mechanic and soldering course in the institute of his city.

Jeferson is thankful for the Kiva lenders; thanks to the help they have given, he will be able to buy a motorcycle. This will help him get to his work since he is located far from the city. In this manner, he will be able to save money in transportation expenses and will be able to continue working and push himself to make is great dream a reality: "To have his own business."

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en:
Domingo is thankful for the financial assistance extended to him as he was able to buy the spare parts of his tricycle. His loan helped not just in his business but also in the education of his children. His income from business is assisting their everyday household expenditures. He and his wife are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
He would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan for him to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Domingo dreams to have an additional tricycle and hopes that his children will finish their education. Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of the tricycle (motorcycle transport vehicle).

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 49 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Janet has a business selling seafood in the Philippines. She requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell to customers, and she has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Janet would like to save enough money to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

loans.name: Bernadita

texts.en:
Bernadita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fruit-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional fruits to sell at her business, which she has been in for five years. Bernadita earns additional income from food vending. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fruits to sell.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Patricia en su venta de carnes al pormayor. Con su credikiav sus inventarios crecieron y dice haber trabajado "menos apurada" con su respuesta a la clientela.  Patricia siente mas comodidad , ha ganado ams clientes y agradece mucho a sus finaciadores por el apoyo recibido. Hoy está aplicando a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará carnes, pues debe ir de compras varias veces al dia y esto disminuíria los costos de venta, haciendo así de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Patricia in her bulk meat sales. With her Kiva loan, her inventory grew and she says she's worked "less hurriedly" with responding to her customers. Patricia feels more comfortable, she has gained more customers and thanks her financiers a lot for the support she received. 

Today she is applying for a Kiva loan, through which she will buy meat. She has to go to buy several times a day and this will decrease selling costs, making her Kiva loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear for resale.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge es separado  y tiene tres hijos Jorge vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler Jorge trabaja como empleado en una empresa y necesita un credito para pagar un curso de inglés para uno de sus hijos Jorge es un padre dedicado y no recibe ayuda de ningún familiar por eso necesita que ustedes le ayuden
texts.en:
Jorge is separated and has three children.

Jorge lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house where he pays rent. 

Jorge works as an employee in a business, and needs a loan to pay for an English course for one of his children.

Jorge is a dedicated father and does not receive help from any family member, and this is why he needs you to help him.

loans.use: to pay for an English course for one of his children.

loans.name: Karla Lizette

texts.es: Karla de 40 años de edad vive en casa  de un familiar con su suegra y sus hijos, el esposo vive en estados unidos y le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, ella posee una pequeña farmacia ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, Karla esta solicita solicitando un crédito para poder instalar la energía en el lugar y comprar mas medicina por mayor y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Karla, age 40, lives in a relative’s house along with her mother-in-law and her children. Her husband lives in the U.S. and helps her with the household expenses. She has a small pharmacy located at her place of residence. She has a lot of customers thanks to the quality of her products and her good prices.

Karla is requesting a loan to install electric power and buy more medicine in bulk. This way she’ll have more incomes and will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy medicine in bulk and install electric power.

loans.name: Ronel

texts.en: Ronel is 36 years old and married with children. He is a hardworking person and he makes sure that he personally visits his rice field every day. Ronel is borrowing money amounting to 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and seeds. Ronel hopes that someday he can renovate his house so that he can give a good quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow.

loans.name: Orange Group

texts.en:
Jamila is a mother of two sons who are in school. She is in her thirties and makes a living for her family by managing a food business, selling juices, milk, porridge and soup with bites. She serves people from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m. each working day and is able to make a good profit each month. 

From Kiva partner, Tujijenge Tanzania, this is Jamila's first loan, which she will use to buy cooking ingredients for her business. Jamila dreams of managing another successful project and improving her food business by cooking more types of food. She will share this loan with her loan group "Orange" which totals ten members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
Gleceria is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her as she was able to buy more products for her direct sales business. Her loan helped not just in her business but also in the education of her child. Her income from the business is supporting everyday household expenditures, and she and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

Gleceria would like to apply for another 19,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies and products to offer for sale, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics The more items she has on display and on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit, which will definitely help her to sustain her child’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Gleceria dreams for her business to grow and hopes to have a better future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, as well as to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies and products to offer for sale, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Junieth  Marina

texts.es:
La  inversión del dinero y el uso de la tecnología, son temas de interés y en lo que se quiere especializar Junieth. Tiene 20 años de edad, está soltera y cursa el primer año de economía en modo nocturno. Es una joven dinámica, amable e inteligente. Cada día lo ve como una oportunidad de aprender algo nuevo, siempre está al tanto de los temas económicos para lograr ser la número uno en su clase. Sus padres son su principal fuente de motivación, ambos trabajan en la venta de marisco y ella les brinda ayuda en la atención a los clientes.
Junieth solicita el crédito para la compra de una computadora laptop, herramienta con la que podrá documentarse, realizar investigaciones y enviar tareas de clase a su debido tiempo. Ella deposita su confianza en el financiamiento, puesto que le permitirá ser una persona de éxito,  además asegura que el buen uso de los medios tecnológicos te permite a ser una persona eficiente. Planea estudiar un curso técnico de cajera y su meta principal es culminar la carrera y trabajar en el área que se especialice.
texts.en:
Junieth is interested in and plans to study investing money and using technology. She's 20 years old and single, and is in her first year of studying economics at night school.  She's a dynamic, friendly, and intelligent young woman.  She sees every day as an opportunity to learn something new.  She's always informed about economic issues so she can be the top student in her class.  Her parents are her main source of motivation; they both work selling shellfish and she helps them wait on customers.
